name: MTBF
description:
Join our Discord!
  • https://discord.gg/Fw6FyFkeBv

MTBF is an action-parkour VR title in which players fight to become the ultimate killing machine.

Whats Included

  • 12 maps
  • 4 minigames
  • Teams mode
  • FFA mode
  • Unique weapons, gizmos, and gadgets
  • Customizable spectator mode
  • Custom game settings
  • And much more to come!

- In the test-chambers victory isn't won by the power of your weapon or the speed of your reflexes, but by your ability to navigate the environment in quick and creative ways. Climb, slide, grapple and fly your way to the top of the scrapyard alone or alongside your friends.



- Players fight in round-based elimination matches across a diverse array of testing environments. Pick from beginner, intermediate and advanced maps to push your skills, and your speed, to the absolute limit. Custom game settings allow players to tailor their matches to fit their desired playstyle.



- Take a breather from the murder and have silly fun-time with mini-games.



Good luck.
